speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report by Alessandro Foglietta, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on a European Union strategy to support Member States in reducing alcohol-related harm ( 2007/2005(INI) ) ( A6-0303/2007 ).
original: President. − The next item is the report by Alessandro Foglietta, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on a European Union strategy to support Member States in reducing alcohol-related harm ( 2007/2005(INI) ) ( A6-0303/2007 ).
